attributes.action: Prohibit plans to increase Gas and Electricity Bills for households.
attributes.additional_details: We should not be 'given' £200 to put towards Energy bills and then have to repay the costs over a period of time. This is not helping. This is creating more debt for households, making more bills unaffordable.
attributes.background: Prohibit plans to increase Gas and Electricity Bills. This has become unaffordable due to the covid pandemic. People have lost jobs, people have gained high amounts of debt. People are struggling to put food on the table. We are physically unable to pay the vast cost increase.
